Name: Island Maze
About the game: If you’re a cube, simple island will become a puzzling maze! You’ll need your shrewdness to get out of island. You surely have some, but if you doubt it – it’s time to reveal your potential! There’re several ways to interact with the island while getting through. You have to collect keys, to climb steep walls, and to manipulate surroundings to pave your way to the portal. Balanced and leisurely game awaits you! Key features: • Mind-bending puzzles • 28 thoroughly designed levels • Secret levels for hardcore players • Beautiful animations and visual effects • Pleasant and relaxing atmosphere • Intuitive controls
